_sText:
My last and final map. I hope you all enjoy playing this map as I have had making it.

For the secret easter egg (to get the awp by the MTM) follow these 5 instructions:
1. Kill the evil fruit
2. Get the secret M4
3. Shoot the box in the red room
4. Shoot a corner in solitary
5. Drop the MP5
(You may do it in any order)

It is possible to finish the maze. Some places my be an illusion. In that case, jump on the wall.

If you decompile and take any part of this map, be sure to include the MTM logo in your work.
